name: Weng Santos
text: The meds restored her health, but not fully.  And weakness talaga side effect ng cancer meds.  They are designed to kill cells, after all.    For me lang, I'm not taking issue with her health because anybody could die soon anyway.  Nobody thought FPJ was going to die within a year of the 04 elections, so had he won, Noli De Castro would've been president until 2010.  Nobody saw that coming.
